name: infobox
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool wikipedia_infobox.
Tool description: An Api to serve the infoboxes that accompanies so many wikipedia entries.
Use it for learning, use it for funfacts, use it for gaining knowledge. 

API description: Fetches and returns a JSON object representation of the infobox for a given Wikipedia entry.

wikiurl.description: The URL of the Wikipedia entry.

withname.description: Whether to include the name in the infobox. Defaults to None.
